text: Sutaram yadi tara apanara sathe bitarke lipta haya tabe apani baluna, ‘ami allah‌ra nikata atmasamarpana karechi ebam amara anusarigana'o.’ Ara yaderake kitaba deya hayeche taderake o niraksaraderake baluna, ‘tomara'o ki atmasamarpana karecha?’ Yadi tara atmasamarpana kare tabe niscaya tara hedayata pabe. Ara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya tabe apanara kartabya sudhu pracara kara. Ara allah‌ bandadera samparke samyaka drasta
